channel.title: CVE Feed for FANUC -- ROBOGUIDE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FANUC -- ROBOGUIDE

item.title: CVE-2021-38483|2024-08-04T01:44:22.805Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to misconfigured binaries, allowing users on the target PC with SYSTEM level privileges access to overwrite the binary and modify files to gain privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2021-43933|2024-08-04T04:10:17.020Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a network-based attack by threat actors sending unimpeded requests to the receiving server, which could cause a denial-of-service condition due to lack of heap memory resources.

item.title: CVE-2021-43986|2024-08-04T04:10:16.964Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The setup program for the affected product configures its files and folders with full access, which may allow unauthorized users permission to replace original binaries and achieve privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2021-43988|2024-08-04T04:10:17.096Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a network-based attack by threat actors utilizing crafted naming conventions of files to gain unauthorized access rights.

item.title: CVE-2021-43990|2024-08-04T04:10:16.950Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a network-based attack by threat actors supplying a crafted, malicious XML payload designed to trigger an external entity reference call.
